description: Work of this Contract comprises renovations to Government of Canada Building located in Canmore, Alberta. Work includes, but is not limited to the following:...
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for Renovations Project in Canmore, AB
## Solicitation Number: M5000-22-5199/A

### Project Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit a request to be qualified to bid on the Renovations Project in Canmore, Alberta. The project involves renovations to a Government of Canada building, including selective interior demolition, patching and preparation of existing surfaces, supply and installation of new millwork, wood doors and steel frames, as well as mechanical and electrical work as specified on the drawings.

### Project Requirements

- Selective interior demolition of existing partitions, doors, and frames
- Patching and preparation of existing surfaces
- Supply and installation of new millwork and wood doors and steel frames
- Supply and installation of miscellaneous washroom fixtures and accessories
- Mechanical and electrical work as specified on drawings

### Key Dates

- Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2023 at 16:00 (Mountain Standard Time)
- Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
- Expected Contract End Date: To be determined

### Qualification Criteria

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the attached Request for Qualifications document. The qualified bidders list will be valid for a period of 60 days or until the contract is awarded, whichever comes first.

### Proposal Preparation and Submission

Proposals must be submitted online through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

### Security Requirement

The contract includes a security requirement. Refer to the attached tender documents for more information.

### Indigenous Procurement

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this procurement. A profile in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory can provide additional business opportunities.

### Contact Information

- Name: Sandra Ellen Robinson
- Email: sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- Phone: 780-670-8626
- Fax: 780-454-4523
- Address: 6th Floor, 10065 Jasper Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 3B1
